author: nightloveart
title: really liked it
review:
First Lego city magazine i buy and what ? this cool fireman inside with all the needed little accessories to add to a scene like car accident. i really like the fact that the fire extinctor is functional but the main problem is that it's very easy to loose the blue piece specially for a kid.

between that im satisfied because i didn't have any fireman yet and we have 4 flames parts who are easy to create a small fire on a car or front of windows.
